{{DisambigMsg|the location in {{game|poe2}}|the quest of the same name|Delver's Row (quest)}}
'''{{PAGENAME}}''' is a [[Pillars of Eternity II: Deadfire world map|location]] in {{poe2}}.

==Background==
{{Description|Somewhere beneath the Gullet is a loose confederation of thugs, thieves, black marketeers, and other seedy individuals. Known as Delver's Row, it's a place where most things can be found for the right price and word always travels quickly.}}
Every city has its black market and the Delver's Row is the current one, bustling with shops and suspicious characters.

==Points of interest==
* This is a fairly large area, though with relatively few characters. Just by the entrance is [[Enarat]], a blind orlan cook.
* [[Rust]] skulks in the corridor to the northeast, with a street merchant selling drugs near the northeastern corner.
* [[Ernezzo]], a black market smuggler, is in a chamber in the central area, with [[Imuani]] in a chamber opposite. Over the bridge in the north, there's the secret entrance to [[Ernezzo]]'s Supply Room opened using a hidden switch ([[Perception|Difficulty]] 16).
* [[The Spindle Man]], a [[Vithrack (Deadfire)|Vithrack]] merchant, is in the west.
* The exit to the [[Undercroft]] is in the northwest. The way is guarded by thugs and the only way to pass peacefully is getting [[Dereo the Lean|Dereo]]'s permission by progressing [[The Cornett's Call]].

* [[The Red Hand]]: Sold by [[Ernezzo]]. Can be stolen from his supply room in a locked chest (difficulty 12).
* [[Rekvu's Fractured Casque]] and [[The Undying Burden]]: Sold by [[Imuani]].
* [[Sisyfo's Stone]], [[Spindle Man's Grimoire]], [[Ring of Regeneration]],  [[Whitewitch Mask]], and [[Obsidian Lamp Figurine (Deadfire)|Obsidian Lamp Figurine]]: Sold by [[the Spindle Man]].
* [[Algol]]: Canine pet. Lurking in the southwestern corridor.
